definition: heel/to follow closely/to go with/(of a woman) to marry sb/with/compared with/to/towards/and (joining two nouns)
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
to fall head over heels/(fig.) to come a cropper
to fall/fig. to suffer a setback
to do a somersault/to turn head over heels
to turn a somersault/to turn head over heels

sentences.english: I was baffled that some ofthe most basic workplace blunders seem to be tripping people up!
sentences.chinese: 許多最基本的職場失誤會讓他們摔跟頭，這讓我困惑。

sentences.english: She performed a somersault with ease .
sentences.chinese: 她一下子就翻了一個跟頭。
人都有栽跟頭的時候，這就是生活。

sentences.english: Barbara came a cropper when her business failed.
sentences.chinese: 巴巴拉破產了，她栽了個大跟頭。

sentences.english: Because of caring about, but trips and falls.
Dishonest people are bound to come a cropper in the end.
sentences.chinese: 不老實的人到頭來總是要栽跟頭的。

sentences.english: Kelly: Did you hear the somersault marathon? It is truly straining.
sentences.chinese: 你聽說過翻跟頭馬拉松嗎？那才叫喫力呢。

sentences.english: A father is a walking stick, let us in life less tumble.
sentences.chinese: 父愛是柺杖，讓我們在人生中少摔跟頭。

sentences.english: Good heavens, the impish son is falling this time.
sentences.chinese: 天啊，小鬼子這次是要栽跟頭了。

sentences.english: Half-naked male and female dancers pranced across the stage.
sentences.chinese: 穿着暴露的男女舞者翻着跟頭從舞臺上穿插而過。

sentences.english: Identifying the correct problem to work on is often where people trip up.
sentences.chinese: 人們經常在問題的鑑別上摔跟頭。

sentences.english: Which economy will be the first to stumble on its problems?
sentences.chinese: 哪個經濟體將是頭一個在自己的問題上栽跟頭的？

sentences.english: Be sure where your next step will fall, so that you will not tumble.
sentences.chinese: 要預測自己會在哪一步跌倒，這樣你就不至於摔跟頭。

sentences.english: Now I tumbled inside the SUV as it somersaulted down the ravine. Branches snapped.
sentences.chinese: 現在只有卡在越野車裏，和它一齊在峽谷裏翻着跟頭。

sentences.english: They need to perform 6 figures such as spirals and summersaults.
sentences.chinese: 他們需要表演6個動作例如盤旋和翻跟頭。

sentences.english: They spin and they tumble. They bounce on the breeze.
sentences.chinese: 它們轉圈，翻跟頭，在微風中彈跳。
